snippet: A startling report says the university’s athletic department violated rules for more than a decade, and the severe punishment includes suspending Boeheim, the men’s basketball coach, for nine games.
abstract: National Collegiate Athletic Assn releases report outlining widespread violations on part of Syracuse University men's basketball program and coach Jim Boeheim; more than 100 of team's victories under Boeheim are expected to be vacated and team will lose 12 scholarships over four years, along with other sanctions.
lead_paragraph: A startling report says the university’s athletic department violated rules for more than a decade, and the severe punishment includes suspending Boeheim, the men’s basketball coach, for nine games.

headline.main: Syracuse Basketball and Coach Jim Boeheim Hit Hard by N.C.A.A.
headline.print_headline: Faulting Coach, N.C.A.A. Hits Syracuse Hard
